about_the_game:
Dungeon Adventure Gang is a co-op top-down multiplayer roguelike where you and three other adventurers team up to explore this unmarked dungeon as far as possible. Explore, gear up, reunite, and push on.

Features:

  • Randomly generated dungeons, each with random rooms, random pathing, random loot, and more!
  • Multiple classes each with varying gameplay styles & mechanics!
  • Multiple dungeon styles with varying enemy pools!
  • Steam integrated online multiplayer along with support for locally hosted servers
  • Controller Support!

This demo offers 5 floors along with modifiable dungeon parameters! Team up with friends and discover everything the dungeon has to offer!

This demo offers 5 floors along with modifiable dungeon parameters! Team up with friends and discover everything the dungeon has to offer!
name: Dungeon Adventure Gang Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 500MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.0 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dungeon Adventure Gang is a co-op top-down multiplayer roguelike where you and three other adventurers team up to explore this unmarked dungeon as far as possible. Explore, gear up, reunite, and push on.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
